EmailTemplate.name: 07-14-21 BNK 1LINK & NCR Webinar Thank You.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our 1LINK & NCR Webinar: How Can FIs Reduce ATM Channel Costs and Complexities through ATMaaS?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering for our webinar about how ATMaaS can reduce the burden of managing your ATM channel. You can access the presentation here <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/1Link%26NCR presentation slides.pdf]]> and recording link <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/lsr.php?RCID=94a71396f62ed7194800a9b2c9d275ba]]>. If you weren’t able to join don’t worry, the details are all in the presentation. If you attended the session and would like to know more about reduced costs, complexity and risk with our end-to-end ATM management solution, explore our ATM as a Service <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-connected-services/atmaas]]>. Sign up to our customer newsletter <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/contact-us/banking-marketing-opt-in]]> for more banking insights. Get in touch <[[mailto:arsalan.hamid@ncr.com]]> today! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
